name: Drop The Hook
description:
Drop The Hook is a simple two player game where the goal is to catch the most fish in 60 seconds. Good luck !

Pro Tip: The more you tap the Wind up key, the faster it comes up !

Keyboard Shortcuts

Q - Player One Cast

W - Player One Wind Up

O - Player Two Cast

P - Player Two Wind Up

SPACE - Start / Skip (Intro) / Play Again (Score Screen)

M - Mute (Turn) on/off Music (Splash and Game only)

F12 - Screenshot

Author

My name is Phil Greenway aka Sikosis and I had a lot of fun and challenges on this project. I enjoyed it and along the way, my experience has grown.

Twitter: @sikosis
